ygData.subject: Re: Najena Camp
ygData.msgSnippet: Onz lah. That way everyone will get enuff level to go to do high stuff by next week liao =) I ll just hang around Birdies until you all come online so we can
ygData.messageBody:
Onz lah. That way everyone will get enuff level to go to do high stuff by
next week liao =) I'll just hang around Birdies until you all come online so
we can meet up..
-----Original Message-----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
To: 'sg-everquest@onelist.com' <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, August 19, 1999 4:50 PM
Subject: RE: [sg-everquest] Najena Camp


>From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
>If u wanna power train ya wiz from 26 to 30, I think HH keep warrior room
>give very good xp (lake is also not bad but at lvl 26 & 27, xp bar rise
>quite slow liao even soloing). Currently FF and I is power training there,
>together with DF. If u join us, plus YY and Sereph, I think we can rule
>the room quite well ;)
>
>Tat room is meant for mid 20s to early 30s. Once u get 32-33, we can
>venture deeper into the raider room.
>
>
>
>On Thursday, 19 August, 1999 4:45 PM, Leshrec [SMTP:leshrec@...]
>wrote:
>> From: "Leshrec" <leshrec@...>
>>
>> Me not level 30 leh only 26 =(
>> Anyways, I think I must power level my wiz this weekend otherwise
>weekdays
>> too busy with school work. Anyone level 20+ interested for a power level
>> grouping this weekend? Must get at least 29 by end of weekend =)
>> Reply this mail then we can discuss go where and party..
>>
>> Leshrec Kalesk'Thor
>> -----Original Message-----
>> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>> To: 'sg-everquest@onelist.com' <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
>> Date: Thursday, August 19, 1999 9:39 AM
>> Subject: RE: [sg-everquest] Najena Camp
>>
>>
>> >From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>> >
>> >Hmm, I have a friend who get Jboot in just few hrs camping - just camp
>at
>> >the least peak hr - S'pore time 4pm to 8 pm. This is the timing when
>Inno
>> >server got least players.
>> >
>> >Now we have 3 lvl 30 kakis in SG guild - Garren, Leshrec and FF. I shld
>be
>> >able to lvl b4 weekend. 4 of us - Lvl 35 Pala, 2 lvl 30 Wiz and 1 Lvl
>30
>> >Magi with pet, shld be abt to handle quite well. I propose the 1st
>troop
>> >Najena hunt after the SOO hunt, maybe the weekend after this, for FBR
>and
>> >Jboot. It may be a Fri 7pm to 3am hunt (details to be spelled out
>later).
>> > All those who are lvl 20 plus still got 1 week plus to lvl to 30 and
>join
>> >us for the hunt ;) (Zan & NIca especially, hehe)
>> >
>> >Hey u guys at lvl 20+ shld form some troop to go for dirk, SBS or WCS ;)
>> >
>> >Ziltus Planeswalker (VS)
>> >
>> >
>> >
>> >On Thursday, 19 August, 1999 8:25 AM, Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy
>> >[SMTP:sccheng@...] wrote:
>> >> From: "Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" <sccheng@...>
>> >>
>> >> as for jboots... its 24 hours on camp... so u just have to be
>somewhere
>> >in
>> >> the queue... i suggest one weekend and dont plan on sleeping for 24
>hours
>> >or
>> >> so... then u can be sure of getting it... and at the same time... make
>> >sure
>> >> theres a team with u (not someone that get his boots then hes gone)...
>> >> also... although u just have to fight Drezlna and her 2 necromancers +
>> >> petssss, there are lots of surprises that will come into the room
>outta
>> >> sudden... its not like if those are green to u they wont come... some
>> >still
>> >> will... AND they always choose to come at the right time (wrong time
>for
>> >> you) thats my advice... so far i see that 2 wizards level34 and 1
>cleric
>> >> level 36 manage to hold out that place no prob... BUT the 2 wiz alone
>> >might
>> >> not be enough... since drez can multiple harm touch... and each goes
>like
>> >> 300hp...
>> >>
>> >> cheers,
>> >> Nicademous
>> >>
